sentences.en: a clear and detailed exposition of their legal position
sentences.cn: 对他们的法律处境清楚而详尽的说明

sentences.en: a detailed assessment of the risks involved
sentences.cn: 对涉及风险的详细评估

sentences.en: A detailed list of our publications is available on request.
sentences.cn: 我们的出版物有一份详细的目录备索.

sentences.en: He detailed a constable to take it to the Incident Room.
sentences.cn: 他派了一名警察把它送到重案调查室。

sentences.en: He gave a detailed account of what happened on the fateful night.
sentences.cn: 他详细描述了那个灾难性夜晚所发生的事。

sentences.en: He had read many detailed critical appraisals of her work.
sentences.cn: 他读了许多详细评论她的作品的文章。

sentences.en: Here is a detailed costing of our proposals.
sentences.cn: 这是我们的方案的详细成本计算。

sentences.en: I started drawing up more detailed budgets.
sentences.cn: 我开始起草更详尽的预算方案。

sentences.en: It was an abbreviated document without detailed proposals.
sentences.cn: 这是一份省去了建议细节的文件简本。

sentences.en: It's an attractively illustrated, detailed guide that'svery practical.
sentences.cn: 这是一本很实用的指南，插图精美，内容详尽。

sentences.en: The book is detailed and well thought out.
sentences.cn: 这本书内容详细，考虑全面。

sentences.en: The report detailed the human rights abuses committed during the war.
sentences.cn: 这份报告详述了战争期间所发生的践踏人权的情况。

sentences.en: We'll put together a proposal, including detailed costings, free of charge.
sentences.cn: 我们将免费拟一份提案，其中包括详细的成本估算。

sentences.en: Yesterday's letter contains a detailed account of the decisions.
sentences.cn: 昨天的那封信里有对这些决议的详细说明。

phrases.tran_cn: 详细规划；详细计划；详细策划
详细调查；详细勘测；碎部测量

trans.tran_en: containing or including a lot of information or details
